text: Ferok railway station (Code: FK) is a railway station in Kozhikode District, Kerala == Administration == The station falls under the Palakkad railway division of the Southern Railway Zone, Indian Railways. ==Location== *11 km from Kozhikode Town. *18 km From Calicut International Airport Category:Railway stations in Kozhikode district Category:Palakkad railway division
title: Ferok railway station
